metadata.title: CVE-2015-8864 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Roundcube Webmail before 1.0.9and 1.1.x before 1.1.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via a crafted SVG, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2016-4068.

criterions.comment: roundcube: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
